name: Frenchies
recipeIngredient: About 1 cup vegetable oil for frying
4 Idaho or russet potatoes, cut in 1/4-inch julienne (place in a bowl of cold water until ready to use)

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet heat the oil (about a depth of 1 inch) and the butter until hot. Working in batches, fry the potatoes for 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown. With a slotted spoon, remove the potatoes and drain on paper towels. Add salt to taste and serve hot.
